name: Boots of Levitation
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Boots of Levitation

sections.body: These soft leather boots are incredibly light and comfortable, with thin soles reinforced by strips of tough hide that provide an unexpected amount of support and protection to the foot. On command, these boots allow the wearer to levitate as if she had cast levitate on herself.
sections.name: Description
